text: Franco Interlenghi (29 October 1931 â€“ 10 September 2015) was an Italian actor. He has worked with great directors such as Federico Fellini in I Vitelloni, Michelangelo Antonioni in I Vinti and Luchino Visconti in his stage adaptation of Death of a Salesman. Interlenghi died on 10 September 2015 in Rome, aged 83. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1931 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Italian movie actors Category:Italian stage actors Category:Actors from Rome
title: Franco Interlenghi
